modules.description: Provides functions to build and query histogram sketches for streaming data, including insertion of values and computation of quantiles. Operates on floating-point numbers and maintains a compact, approximate representation of their distribution. Used to efficiently estimate quantiles from large datasets without storing all input values.

Provides operations to manage and analyze histograms, including creating, adding values, merging, and extracting statistical estimates like mean, standard deviation, and quantiles. Works with histograms structured as lists of bins, each containing center, count, and range information. Used to approximate distributions, estimate cumulative counts, and compute statistical properties from large datasets.
